graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:AdminCreateTenantInput!)
{
	adminCreateTenant (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:[QueryStatementInput])
{
	adminGetTenants (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:[QueryStatementInput])
{
	adminFindTenant (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	adminFindTenantById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:AdminUpdateTenantInput!)
{
	adminUpdateTenant (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	adminDeleteTenantById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:[QueryStatementInput])
{
	adminDeleteTenants (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
